title: Human Resource Database
subTitle: This is a subtitle
overviewContent: I designed and implemented a comprehensive database to streamline the management of employee information, and performance evaluations. By analysing the HR department's specific needs, I structured the database for efficient data retrieval and reporting, enabling informed decision-making.

jd: Collaborating with HR personnel to gather requirements and understand their specific data management needs.
Designing the database structure to efficiently store and manage employee information, and performance metrics.
Implementing data migration strategies to import existing HR data into the new system.
